entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
